item.description:
Red Tails, The Movie will be playing on Sunday the 22nd.  How about we fly to KDXR, find a cab or loaner cars into the theater, should be 10 minutes, 3.0 miles from A to B.  There is a Cafe at the theater. Catch the 10:00AM movie. By 12:30 we should be back at DXR and 1:00 depart time for a flight back to KFIT to see the Patriot's Game.

What could be better than a day of flying, eating, watching flying movies and flying again? You can either buy your tickets online or we can "line up and wait" at the theater like others do.

STILL NOT SURE? Watch This, as they say...

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BpA6TC0T_Lw&feature=youtube_gdata_player

Here are showtimes for Red Tails (PG-13) at AMC Loews Danbury 16 on 01/22/12:

10:00 AM  |  1:00 PM  |  4:30 PM  |  7:45 PM  |  11:00 PM

Theater Address:
61 Eagle Rd, Danbury, CT 06810

Find more showtimes and tickets on Fandango for Red Tails and other movies

 

This is a big screen Digital movie. Should be good. Depart times can be altered if needed to make the event! 

A Fun Filled day of flying food and more flying!

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fly to see Red Tails movie!
